item.title: Linear regression with R
item.description: linear regression A simple linear regression using mtcars dataset, which is available with R. Here, we look at how number of cylinders in a car is associated with how many miles a car travels per gallon of gasoline–an indicator of fuel economy. Let’s look at the structure of mtcars first. str(mtcars) ## 'data.frame': 32 obs. of 11 variables: ## $ mpg : num 21 21 22.8 21.4 18.7 18.1 14.3 24.
